name: AWAY FROM HOME (DulcaNikos)
description:
You are a fox and your goal is to get home.. there are some collectibles that you can collect on this trip and enemies that you should.. avoid.

• 15 Cherries     • 8 Diamonds 

I made this game as a project for my first semester in SAE College.

The game is made with free assets.

Sprites : https://assetstore.unity.com/top-assets/top-free  ,  https://itch.io

Sounds : https://freesound.org
